txt.en: Talk to King Thráin at Amdân
Even in the midst of the battle of Azanulbizar, the thrill of hunting elusive prey captured King Thráin's attention.
Defeat one of the elusive foes of Azanulbizar
'Ah-ha! So it was more truth than rumour after all!\n\n'My duties to the Haban'akkâ demand my attention, but I thank you for sharing the tale of your hunt!'
King Thráin can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou have defeated one of the elusive foes rumoured to have been spotted at Azanulbizar. You should return to King Thráin.
Elusive foes can be found at Azanulbizar.\n\nKing Thráin has asked you to find and defeat one of the elusive foes rumoured to have been spotted at Azanulbizar.

'Rumours have told me that our warriors have crossed paths with a number of elusive foes at Azanulbizar. Some of them loyal to Azog, and others... mighty beasts of the dale!\n\n'If you encounter one of these foes and manage to subdue it, I would hear the tale of your hunt!'
